transition_context.mental_health: Markedly improved since transition. Resolution of long-standing depression and suicidal ideation.

social_context.passing: Reads as passing in daily life. May be read as 'trans-passing' rather than unambiguously cis in some contexts.
social_context.comfort_high: Embodied, physical contexts (gym, locker room, sauna)
social_context.comfort_lower: Work/school contexts where voice and authority are salient

shoulder_to_hip_ratio.reality: Skeletal structure cannot change. Focus on: glute/hip development (ongoing), upper-body atrophy (needs time), fat deposition (requires consistent surplus), posture (ballet helps).
shoulder_to_hip_ratio.context: Many cis women have broad shoulders. Natural variation is enormous. FFS success indicates strong overall presentation.

voice.options: Voice feminization training, speech-language pathologist consultation

body_image_concerns.facial_scrutiny: Despite FFS success and no misgendering, internal hypervigilance persists

key_points: Upper-body atrophy is already happening but takes years
Fat redistribution requires consistent caloric surplus
Further restriction won't meaningfully accelerate changes
Primary work: patience, consistency, reducing hypervigilant self-scrutiny
timeline_and_expectations.principle: Trust the process. On strong estrogen with suppressed testosterone, feminization is inevitable given time. Focus on not interfering rather than forcing faster changes.

transition_context.comparison_set: Ballet dancers, fit trans women, similarly-sized cis celebrities (extremely high-bar)
transition_context.core_goal: Look like a fit, attractive cis woman consistently, without bottom surgery
transition_context.primary_current_work: Internal recalibration and reducing hypervigilant self-scrutiny rather than further medical/surgical intervention
